tatami.simulation

Interface AgentManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeAgent, SimulationLinkAgent, SimulationManager

    public interface AgentManager
    An instance implementing this interface is a wrapper to an actual agent instance (that may be not yet created). It offers methods for managing the lifecycle of an agent, for instance starting and stopping.
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAgentName()
      Retrieves the name of the agent managed by this instance.
      boolean setPlatformLink(PlatformLoader.PlatformLink link)
      Creates a link from the agent to the platform, which will facilitate the invocation of specific platform functionality.
      boolean start()
      Starts the agent.
      boolean stop()
      Stops the agent.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        boolean start()
        Starts the agent. If this goes well, from this moment on the agent should be executing normally.

        The method must guarantee that once it has been started, it can immediately begin to receive events, even if those events will not be processed immediately.

        Returns:
        true if the agent was started without error. false otherwise.

      • stop

        boolean stop()
        Stops the agent. After this method succeeds, the agent should not be executing any more.
        Returns:
        true if the agent was stopped without error. false otherwise.

      • setPlatformLink

        boolean setPlatformLink(PlatformLoader.PlatformLink link)
        Creates a link from the agent to the platform, which will facilitate the invocation of specific platform functionality. The passed instance may be the platform itself, or some agent-specific instance, depending on the platform.

        This method can usually by called only when the agent is not running.

        Parameters:
        link - - the link to the platform.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful. false otherwise.

      • getAgentName

        java.lang.String getAgentName()
        Retrieves the name of the agent managed by this instance.
        Returns:
        the name of the agent.
